title: Alan Light: Looking Back and Looking Ahead in the World of Music
itunes:title: Alan Light: Looking Back and Looking Ahead in the World of Music
description: Alan Light, veteran music journalist and host of “In The Light” on SiriusXM, discusses how the pandemic affected the world of music, what we gained and what we lost, and what we might look forward to for 2021
content:encoded: Alan Light, veteran music journalist and host of “In The Light” on SiriusXM, discusses how the pandemic affected the world of music, what we gained and what we lost, and what we might look forward to for 2021
